ratings.comment: Nick Story was an amazing professor all year, making our classes extremely enjoyable and interesting. I love his course flow and plan, especially how he builds up every assignment. Probably my favorite professor this semester!
You should definitely take a class with Nick. You can tell he cares for his students and the class was an easy A if you do the readings and complete your assignments on time.

Nick Story is a very kind, well-humored, and great professor. ENGL 100 was easy with him, he also always assigned interested (and short) readings which was greatly appreciated and easy to balance with my other classes.
Super great guy. Very straightforward, kind, and understanding. He also gave great feedback and in a timely manner too :)

Nick is a really nice guy. You can tell he cares and wants you to succeed. Readings are straightforward. Discussions can feel a little unnecessary at times but some are interesting. You get to pick topics for your papers and it's more focused on you growing as a writer, which is nice. Lots of small group discussions. If you try you'll get an A.

Nick is such a sweetie. He's very understanding if you need to turn in something later or can't come to class one day because of an exam or personal matters. Just be open and honest with him and you're good to go.
If you are taking ENG100, Nick is the best! His class is very straightforward and he is very understanding. He is probably the most caring and understandable professor I have had thus far.
Really nice instructor , approachable and laid back. would recommend

He is so easy and chill. You literally have like no homework outside of 3 short reflection assignments and the3 papers. Class is kind of boring because you do nothing, but you get points for attendance.
Such a laid back guy, really recommend if you need a super easy class

Nick Story is honestly the GOAT of English 100 Professors. He's extremely laid back, will give you extensions if need be, readings are optional. You have three papers the whole semester, with plenty of time, and graded super leniently. He's really considerate and you'll enjoy his class.
Nick Story is great! We have discussions every class and it's nice to talk about the readings. It's a very chill class in general.

(Spring 2020-2021) This is a comm A course so there is a bit of writing (but usually short). The writing is more to develop your own voice vs. hardcore structure. He's very chill. There are no lectures & very few readings (if there are, they're short). The areas we wrote about were very widespread & honestly made the class really enjoyable & fun.

Very genuine guy. If you show improvement you get good grades! Very kind and always willing to work with students. 10/10 would recommend, one of the easiest english100 teachers based off what I’ve heard.
This class was well set up for distance learning. The feedback he gave on papers was easy to understand. If you do the work and show youre improving, you will be able to get an A in this class.

I would definitely take Nick again. He gave really good feedback on our papers, and if we needed extra help he was always willing to make time. He also would bring in snacks or drinks on some days to make class more interesting/enjoyable. I think the students in my class made it hard for him to lead discussion because they would never participate.
